mlflow.rationale: There is no meaningful evidence of MLflow usage, as indicated by the absence of tracking, experiments, registered models, and CI/CD.

sagemaker.rationale: There is no evidence of SageMaker usage, including training jobs, endpoints, pipelines, or registry usage.

azureml.rationale: There is no evidence of using Azure ML features such as jobs, endpoints, pipelines, or registry.

kubeflow.rationale: There is no evidence of pipelines, components, or manifests present, indicating a lack of maturity in Kubeflow usage.

cicd_policy_gates.rationale: There is no evidence of any CI/CD processes or policy gates in place.

tracking_maturity.rationale: There is no evidence of any tools, metrics, or artifacts logged, indicating a lack of experiment tracking maturity.
